mapper.select:
select wms_requisition.material_no "materialNo", wms_requisition.material_name "materialName", wm.brand, wm.space, wm.price, wms_requisition.quantity, wms_requisition.unit, wms_requisition.status, wms_requisition.deliver_quantity "deliverQuantity" from wms_requisition left join wms_material wm on wms_requisition.material_no = wm.material_no
and wms_requisition.code=#{code}
